Instead of a classic reconstruction of life, the biographer offers a collage of excerpts from Rahel\u2019s letters with extensive commentary. This form encourages one to read Rahel Varnhagen as a narration about the author and her own struggle with Jewish and female identity. However, this text is of great importance to explore some questions of Arendt's thought that, although they have continuity, find less development in her other books. In On Revolution, Arendt focuses her attention on the institutional dimension of revolutionary political action. This is essential for a more conprehensive portrait of Hannah Arendt's political thinking as well as for mobilizing it in order to reflect about our Latin American political realities. In this work we propose certain elements of analysis of the political thought of Hannah Arendt, as they appear in her work On Revolution. Arendt concebe a educa\u00e7\u00e3o como um espa\u00e7o de media\u00e7\u00e3o e cuidado entre as gera\u00e7\u00f5es, em que as mais antigas t\u00eam a responsabilidade de introduzir as gera\u00e7\u00f5es mais novas no mundo. Sua principal contribui\u00e7\u00e3o ao conceito de pol\u00edtica \u00e9 o resgate de um conceito de a\u00e7\u00e3o como a instaura\u00e7\u00e3o do novo. Diversos autores j\u00e1 apontaram a inspira\u00e7\u00e3o greco-ateniense do empreendimento arendtiano. Este artigo pretende mostrar que, al\u00e9m da inspira\u00e7\u00e3o greco-ateniense que levou ao conceito da novidade da a\u00e7\u00e3o, a obra de Hannah Arendt tamb\u00e9m possui uma inspira\u00e7\u00e3o romano-republicana necess\u00e1ria para pensar a institucionaliza\u00e7\u00e3o de novas formas de a\u00e7\u00e3o. O texto pretende mostrar que as duas dimens\u00f5es est\u00e3o em uma posi\u00e7\u00e3o de tens\u00e3o na obra arendtiana, e que essa tens\u00e3o encontra uma solu\u00e7\u00e3o parcial nos escritos arendtianos sobre a rep\u00fablica nos Estados Unidos. Thirty years after Hannah Arendt\u2019s death, the author is considered one of the best political theorists of the 20th century. Hannah Arendt main contribution to political theory is her concept of action and its role in the redefinition of the political realm, in particular, the way it has inserted the idea of new beginning into modern politics. Many authors have already pointed out the Athenian inspiration of Hannah Arendt\u2019s concept of the political. In this article, it is shown that Hannah Arendt has been inspired not only by the Greek tradition but also by a Roman tradition concern with the issue of institutionalization of political action. However, the text shows that both dimensions instead of being complementary stand in a tension within her oeuvre and that this tension only finds a partial solution in the Arendtian writings on the American revolution. Rahel Varnhagen, Hannah Arendt, Judith Butler The article is an attempt at capturing the relationship between the lives and creative attitudes of Rahel Varnhagen, Hannah Arendt and Judith Butler. Starting with Varnhagen\u2019s biography written by Arendt, the essay\u2019s author wonders about the philosopher\u2019s writing strategy. Instead of a classic reconstruction of life, the biographer offers a collage of excerpts from Rahel\u2019s letters with extensive commentary. This form encourages one to read Rahel Varnhagen as a narration about the author and her own struggle with Jewish and female identity. The second relationship analysed in the essay is the impact of Hannah Arendt\u2019s texts on Judith Butler\u2019s writings. Despite the criticism of the philosopher\u2019s writings, Arendt remains an unquestionable inspiration to Butler. Even though Arendt is known primarily as a political theorist one can also read hear work in a broader sense as a philosophy of culture. This article discusses how Arendt\u2019s various narratives of Western history are animated by the attempt to explain how we can come to terms with our fragmented past after what Arendt calls the breakdown of the Western cultural tradition in the modern age. The meaning of culture, narrativity and art as concepts for Arendt as well as her analysis of various art forms are dealt with in detail. I focus especially on the narrative and metaphorical aspects of art and philosophy in Arendt\u2019s writings. Keywords: Hannah Arendt, culture, politics, art, narrativity. Para ello, analizamos ciertas categor\u00edas fundamentales de su obra, tales como historia y comprensi\u00f3n. Assim, na impossibilidade de compreens\u00e3o do p\u00fablico e do privado, desaparece a possibilidade da pol\u00edtica, como capacidade de romper com o imediato, e emerge o social. _______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ ABSTRACT _______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ This article sets out to undertake an initial discussion of the relationship between the public and the private in the thinking of Hannah Arendt. This discussion is of utmost importance nowadays since the distinction between public and private spheres tends to be subsumed, to the extent that the private seems to be public and vice versa. The position of Hannah Arendt El trabajo examina la interpretaci\u00f3n de Hannah Arendt del pen-samiento pol\u00edtico de Thomas Jefferson. En primer lugar, presentamos los principales argumentos que lo ubican en el marco de las ideas del libera-lismo. Al respecto, en sus escritos del per\u00edodo pre revolucionario Jefferson alude a la antigua constituci\u00f3n sajona y a los derechos naturales de John Locke. En segundo lugar, exponemos la posici\u00f3n de Hannah Arendt respec-to de la Revoluci\u00f3n americana como r\u00e9plica del republicanismo cl\u00e1sico, en desmedro de la tesis prevaleciente hasta 1960, que la ubica bajo la \u00e9gida del liberalismo cl\u00e1sico. En este contexto, mostramos que la autora interpre-ta a T. Jefferson como representante del republicanismo, destacando, en particular, su tesis sobre el sistema de consejos ; The paper examines Hannah Arendt\u2019s interpretation of Thomas Jefferson\u2019s political thought. First, we put forward the main arguments that place him within the framework of political liberalism. In this regard, his writings of the pre-revolutionary period allude to the ancient Saxon constitution and to the natural rights of John Locke. Second, we expose Hannah Arendt\u2019s assessment of the American Revolution as a replica of classical republicanism, to the detriment of the thesis prevailing until 1960, which places it within the context of classical liberalism. We assert that she interprets T. Esta doble perspectiva ofrece un perfil completo de lo que denomina el \u201cdelito original\u201d de los Estados Unidos: la esclavitud y la exclusi\u00f3n del pueblo negro e indio de la Constituci\u00f3n de 1787. Sus reflexiones sobre la educaci\u00f3n p\u00fablica segregada y sobre la desobediencia civil entre la poblaci\u00f3n negra constituyen una oportunidad de repensar el problema de la inclusi\u00f3n jur\u00eddica en el mundo actual. ; Hannah Arendt addresses the problem of racism against African-Americans in the social and in the political realm. She makes a careful distinction between these two realms and this double perspective provides a complete profile of what she calls the \"original crime\" of the United States: Black slavery and the exclusion of Black and Indian people of the 1787 Constitution. His reflections on segregated public education and civil disobedience among African-Americans are an opportunity to rethink the problem of legal inclusion today. El segundo prop\u00f3sito es establecer en qu\u00e9 sentido, seg\u00fan esta autora, la actividad del pensamiento puede ser una condici\u00f3n contra la maldad. Como en su determinaci\u00f3n del pensar Hannah Arendt se vuelve pol\u00e9micamente contra todo intento por ver el pensar ya como un ejercicio intelectual, ya como una actividad puramente mental, ya como la fundaci\u00f3n o prosecuci\u00f3n de tradiciones de pensamiento, ya como el monopolio de unos pocos (los fil\u00f3sofos), ya como la elaboraci\u00f3n de doctrinas o sistemas\u2026, el texto muestra subrepticiamente esta confrontaci\u00f3n constante de Arendt con la tradici\u00f3n filos\u00f3fica. Tal confrontaci\u00f3n con la tradici\u00f3n filos\u00f3fica tiene lugar al hilo de una conversaci\u00f3n permanente con S\u00f3crates, en cuyos di\u00e1logos advirti\u00f3 Hannah Arendt un ejemplo inequ\u00edvoco de la actividad del pensamiento. The most general hypothesis it advances is that Losurdo, although effective in criticizing the identity of Nazism and Stalinism, maintains himself, despite his numerous contributions, on a descriptive plane, failing to question the theoretical and metaphysical foundations of his juxtaposition to Hannah Arendt. This tendency prevents a more profound critique of the concept of totalitarianism and the presentation of an alternative explanation of Stalinism. ; Esse artigo \u00e9 uma tentativa de cotejar o mais influente livro sobre o chamado totalitarismo, de Hannah Arendt, e as formula\u00e7\u00f5es cr\u00edticas a ele elaboradas por Domenico Losurdo. A hip\u00f3tese mais geral \u00e9 que Losurdo, embora eficaz na cr\u00edtica \u00e0 identifica\u00e7\u00e3o de nazismo e stalinismo, mant\u00e9m-se, apesar de suas in\u00fameras contribui\u00e7\u00f5es, no plano descritivo, abrindo m\u00e3o de questionar os fundamentos te\u00f3rico-metodol\u00f3gicos de sua contraposi\u00e7\u00e3o a Hannah Arendt, o que prejudica a cr\u00edtica mais profunda do conceito de totalitarismo e a apresenta\u00e7\u00e3o de uma explica\u00e7\u00e3o alternativa do stalinismo. The paper is emphatic that local democracy, as realized in German history, overlaps with Hannah Arendt\u2019s views on democracy. It can be some kind of protective shield against dictatorship, and in the spirit of Hannah Arendt, local democracy proves to be a foundation of the democratic state. In substantiating her case, the author first examines the workings of medieval German cities, as peculiar \u201cmini-states\u201d, and then turns to a description of the reinforcement of the ruler\u2019s power at the expense of city autonomy, which took place in the sixteenth and seventieth centuries. Afterwards, she thoroughly examines Hannah Arendt\u2019s views on the concept of the citizen, characterised by the ancient notion of the citizen actively taking part in community affairs. Baseia-se nos meus pr\u00f3prios apontamentos como seu aluno em Cornell e nos roteiros preparados por Hannah Arendt para ministrar o curso, que est\u00e3o guardados nos seus pap\u00e9is na Biblioteca do Congresso dos Estados Unidos. Indica, com base na documenta\u00e7\u00e3o contida na Biblioteca do Congresso, as converg\u00eancias desse curso com o ministrado anteriormente, em 1955, na Universidade da Calif\u00f3rnia e, subseq\u00fcentemente, em 1968, na New School for Social Research. Explora como esses cursos contribuem para a compreens\u00e3o da import\u00e2ncia por ela atribu\u00edda, na sua obra, \u00e0 experi\u00eancia, \u00e0 narra\u00e7\u00e3o, \u00e0 a\u00e7\u00e3o, \u00e0 imagina\u00e7\u00e3o e ao ju\u00edzo reflexivo, que s\u00e3o componentes da maior relev\u00e2ncia na configura\u00e7\u00e3o da originalidade do percurso intelectual de Hannah Arendt e que dela fazem uma das grandes pensadoras do s\u00e9culo XX. ; The article examines the intellectual relevance of Hannah Arendt\u2019s graduate course, \"Political Experiences of the Twentieth Century\", given in the Fall of 1965 at Cornell University. The article draws on my notes taken as her student in this course and on her own notes prepared for the course that are in her papers in the Library of Congress. The article relates, on the basis of her papers in the Library of Congress, this course to a previous one offered in 1955 at the University of California and to a subsequent one in 1968 given at the New School for Social Research. The article explores how these courses are relevant for the understanding of the importance in Hannah Arendt\u2019s work of experience, narrative, action, imagination, reflective judgement, that are critical components of her originality as a major thinker of the XXth century. No entanto, seu problema de pesquisa ainda n\u00e3o estava bem delineado e o destaque para ambos os textos est\u00e1 relacionado com o conceito de forma\u00e7\u00e3o (Bildung) e n\u00e3o diretamente a respeito da educa\u00e7\u00e3o e de suas institui\u00e7\u00f5es. Nosso objetivo neste artigo \u00e9 investigar como o tema foi tratado por Hannah Arendt antes da sua imigra\u00e7\u00e3o para os Estados Unidos e quais s\u00e3o os elementos que permanecer\u00e3o em suas obras posteriores. Para tanto, nos ocuparemos com a investiga\u00e7\u00e3o de dois textos: i) sua resenha a respeito da obra do pedagogo alem\u00e3o Hans Weil, Die Entstehung des deutschen Bildungsprinzip (O surgimento do princ\u00edpio alem\u00e3o da Bildung), publicado em 1930 e ii) O Iluminismo e a quest\u00e3o judaica, de 1932. ; With the exception of the text Crisis in Education, published in the 1950s, Hannah Arendt wrote directly about this subject in the writings of her youth, in the 1930s. However, her research problem had not yet been well delineated, and both texts dealing with the matter highlight the concept of formation (Bildung) instead of directly addressing education and its institutions. Our goal in this article is to investigate how the subject was addressed by Hannah Arendt prior to her immigration to the United States and what elements remain in her later works. In order to do so, we shall deal with two texts: (i) her review of German pedagogue Hans Weil's work, Die Entstehung des deutschen Bildungsprinzip, published in 1930; and (ii) The Enlightenment and the Jewish Question, from 1932. Sua s\u00f3lida forma\u00e7\u00e3o filos\u00f3ficoteol\u00f3gica e sua percep\u00e7\u00e3o agu\u00e7ada dos totalitarismos foram fundamentais para o respeito adquirido junto ao ambiente acad\u00eamico e pol\u00edtico. M\u00faltiplas foram as interpreta\u00e7\u00f5es de sua obra e os estudiosos seguem, at\u00e9 os dias atuais, debru\u00e7ados sobre todos os poss\u00edveis desdobramentos da sua filosofia. Desse modo, o intuito do nosso trabalho \u00e9 avaliar aqui uma dessas quest\u00f5es, a saber, a influ\u00eancia de Kierkegaard no seu pensamento. Para tanto, a executaremos atrav\u00e9s das seguintes subdivis\u00f5es: (1) um breve panorama da vida e obra da autora; (2) Hannah Arendt, leitora de S\u00f8ren Aabye Kierkegaard; (3) Hannah Arendt e a \u00e9poca moderna: a quest\u00e3o da d\u00favida e (4) considera\u00e7\u00f5es finais. _______________________________________________________________________________ ABSTRACT ; Hannah Arendt (1906-1975), woman, and Jewish thinker was one of the most challenging of the twentieth century. Its solid theological and philosophical and his keen sense of totalitarianism were fundamental to the respect for purchase from the academic and political environment. Were multiple interpretations of his work and follow the scholars, even today, looking at all the possible consequences of his philosophy. Thus, the aim of our study is to evaluate one of these issues here, namely the influence of Kierkegaard in his thinking. To do so, will run through the following subdivisions: (1) a brief overview of the life and work of the author, (2) Hannah Arendt, S\u00f8ren Aabye Kierkegaard reader, (3) Hannah Arendt and the modern era: a question of doubt, (4) concluding remarks. Realizou-se uma an\u00e1lise das obras A Condi\u00e7\u00e3o Humana e Entre o Passado e o Futuro, de Hannah Arendt, e Magia e T\u00e9cnica, Arte e Pol\u00edtica: ensaios sobre literatura e hist\u00f3ria da cultura, de Walter Benjamin. A escolha dessas obras ocorreu em virtude da identifica\u00e7\u00e3o, nelas, de converg\u00eancias de pensamento sobre o direito \u00e0 mem\u00f3ria, seus sentidos e significados a partir da contemporaneidade. Benjamin evidencia uma experi\u00eancia causada pelo horror da Primeira Guerra Mundial e o silenciamento vivido pelos soldados e suas experi\u00eancias traum\u00e1ticas, o que empobreceu suas a\u00e7\u00f5es comunic\u00e1veis. No di\u00e1logo que se buscou estabelecer entre as ideias arendtianas acerca da mem\u00f3ria e a tradi\u00e7\u00e3o, identificou-se que, embora a categoria mem\u00f3ria n\u00e3o seja central nos escritos de Hannah Arendt, h\u00e1 conceitos voltados \u00e0 Hist\u00f3ria e Mem\u00f3ria, perspectiva em que Hannah Arendt questiona as rupturas e descontinuidades vivenciadas pelos judeus no holocausto. Desse modo, o ponto de converg\u00eancia entre os dois pensadores est\u00e1 na rela\u00e7\u00e3o entre a liberdade individual e a tradi\u00e7\u00e3o, no momento compartilhamento e de rela\u00e7\u00f5es com o mundo que herdamos. Terenzi"},{"id":"414df11866308af6e96112f84e6949ead84d93adb06c92592eddbde58961526c","content":"Acci\u00f3n e instituci\u00f3n en el pensamiento pol\u00edtico de Hannah Arendt: lecturas de Sobre la Revoluci\u00f3n Como se\u00f1ala Margaret Canovan, Sobre la Revoluci\u00f3n ha sido uno de los libros menos le\u00eddos y menos comprendido de Hannah Arendt, y nuestros pa\u00edses no hay sido una excepci\u00f3n a esta regla. Sin embargo, el texto resulta de gran importancia para explorar algunas cuestiones del pensamiento de Arendt que, si bien tienen continuidad, encuentran menor desarrollo en sus otros libros. All\u00ed, Arendt centra su atenci\u00f3n en la dimensi\u00f3n instituyente de la acci\u00f3n pol\u00edtica revolucionaria. Este resulta un aspecto esencial para tener un panorama m\u00e1s completo del pensamiento pol\u00edtico de Hannah Arendt, as\u00ed como para movilizarlo a fin de pensar nuestras realidades pol\u00edticas latinoamericanas. En este trabajo nos proponemos, entonces, ofrecer ciertos elementos de an\u00e1lisis del pensamiento pol\u00edtico de Hannah Arendt, tal como aparecen en su obra Sobre la Revoluci\u00f3n. Enmarcaremos nuestra lectura entre dos interpretaciones que, a nuestro entender, son igualmente interesantes, fuertemente influyentes en el contexto latinoamericano y que constituyen referencias esenciales en la comprensi\u00f3n de la obra de Arendt, pero que difieren en cuanto a la interpretaci\u00f3n que dan a su pensamiento pol\u00edtico y en particular en cuanto al lugar que las instituciones pol\u00edticas ocupan en \u00e9l. Estos son las interpretaciones de \u00c9tienne Tassin sobre las paradojas de la revoluci\u00f3n en la obra de Arendt y la de Margaret Canovan sobre el nuevo republicanismo arendtiano. Luego desarrollaremos algunas claves de una lectura propia de Sobre la revoluci\u00f3n que camine entre ambas posturas. Finalmente, ofreceremos una conclusi\u00f3n que recapitule y ponga en evidencia los puntos salientes de nuestro argumento. ; ***Agency and institution of Hannah Arendt\u2019s political thinking: reading On Revolution***As Margaret Canovan points out, On Revolution has been one of the least read and least understood books of Hannah Arendt and our Latin American countries has not been the exception to this rule. However, this text is of great importance to explore some questions of Arendt's thought that, although they have continuity, find less development in her other books. In On Revolution, Arendt focuses her attention on the institutional dimension of revolutionary political action. This is essential for a more conprehensive portrait of Hannah Arendt's political thinking as well as for mobilizing it in order to reflect about our Latin American political realities. In this work we propose certain elements of analysis of the political thought of Hannah Arendt, as they appear in her work On Revolution. We will frame our reading between two interpretations which, in our view, are equally interesting, strongly influential in the Latin American context and which are essential references on the understanding of Arendt's work, but which differ in their interpretation of her political thinking and in particular as to the place which political institutions occupy in it. These are the interpretations of \u00c9tienne Tassin on the paradoxes of Arendt's understanding of the revolution and those of Margaret Canovan on the new arendtian republicanism. Then we will develop some keys to our own reading of On Revolution that stand in between both positions. Finally, we will offer a conclusion recapitulating the most significant points of our argument. ; ***A\u00e7\u00e3o e institui\u00e7\u00e3o no pensamento pol\u00edtico de Hannah Arendt: leituras de Sobre a Revolu\u00e7\u00e3o***Como diz Margaret Canovan, On Revolution \u00e9 um dos livros menos estudados y menos compreendidos de Hannah Arendt e os nossos pa\u00edses n\u00e3o s\u00e3o uma exce\u00e7\u00e3o \u00e0 regra. No entanto, o texto \u00e9 de grande import\u00e2ncia para explorar algumas quest\u00f5es em Arendt que, apesar de ter continuidade, s\u00e3o menos desenvolvidos em seus outros livros. Nele, Arendt enfoca a dimens\u00e3o instituinte da a\u00e7\u00e3o pol\u00edtica revolucion\u00e1ria. Esse \u00e9 um elemento essencial para temos uma vis\u00e3o mais completa do pensamento pol\u00edtico da Hannah Arendt e pensamos as nossas realidades pol\u00edticas da Am\u00e9rica Latina. Neste trabalho, ent\u00e3o, oferecemos certos elementos de an\u00e1lise do pensamento pol\u00edtico de Hannah Arendt como eles aparecem na sua obra Sobre a Revolu\u00e7\u00e3o. Vamos enquadrar a nossa leitura entre duas interpreta\u00e7\u00f5es que, na nossa opini\u00e3o, s\u00e3o igualmente interessantes, muito influentes no contexto da Am\u00e9rica Latina, e que s\u00e3o refer\u00eancias essenciais para a compreens\u00e3o da obra de Arendt, mas diferem quanto \u00e0 interpreta\u00e7\u00e3o dada ao seu pensamento pol\u00edtico e, em particular, quanto ao local que as institui\u00e7\u00f5es pol\u00edticas ocupam nele. Essas s\u00e3o as interpreta\u00e7\u00f5es de \u00c9tienne Tassin sobre os paradoxos da revolu\u00e7\u00e3o na obra de Arendt e de Margaret Canovan sobre o novo republicanismo arendtiano. Em seguida, vamos desenvolver algumas chaves para uma leitura pr\u00f3pria de On Revolution entre as duas posi\u00e7\u00f5es. Finalmente, vamos oferecer uma conclus\u00e3o e trazer os pontos mais importantes do nosso argumento. El obispo argelino destac\u00f3 el amor al pr\u00f3jimo como v\u00eda de encuentro con Dios, ya que el anhelo del pensador cristiano era la civitate Dei. Arendt, quince siglos despu\u00e9s, seculariz\u00f3 el concepto y elabor\u00f3 una teor\u00eda pol\u00edtica basada en el amor al mundo, a la vida y a los hombres. Para ello desarroll\u00f3 diversos conceptos, entre los que se encuentran la acci\u00f3n, la natalidad y la pol\u00edtica, que simult\u00e1neamente requieren elementos como la pluralidad, la novedad o la libertad. Por ello, el amor es un concepto clave en su obra, a pesar de que insistiera en que se trata de una fuerza apol\u00edtica y antipol\u00edtica. ; In her doctoral dissertation Hannah Arendt examined the question of love in Saint Augustine of Hippo. The Algerian bishop emphasized love of one\u2019s neighbor as a way of meeting God, as his desire was the civitate Dei. Fifteen centuries later, Arendt secularized the concept and developed a political theory based on love of the world, of life and of men. For this purpose, she developed several concepts, including action, natality and politics, which in turn require elements such as plurality, novelty or freedom. Therefore, love is a key concept in her work, even though she stated that this was an apolitical and antipolitical force. love; world; plurality; freedom; politics; mankind.; amor; mundo; pluralidad; libertad; pol\u00edtica; hombres. De acordo com Hannah Arendt, esse n\u00e3o \u00e9 um fen\u00f4meno gerado na esfera da educa\u00e7\u00e3o, n\u00e3o obstante, seu impacto nesse \u00e2mbito apare\u00e7a aos olhos da autora como o sintoma mais evidente da profundidade e seriedade desta crise. Este trabalho tem por objetivo analisar o conceito de autoridade na obra de Hannah Arendt, propondo uma abordagem que busca romper com as perspectivas que veem a autoridade como um epifen\u00f4meno do poder. Desse modo, busca-se lan\u00e7ar um olhar sobre a autoridade como um elemento consubstancial \u00e0 educa\u00e7\u00e3o e n\u00e3o como um mero instrumento de poder, submiss\u00e3o e sujei\u00e7\u00e3o de indiv\u00edduos. Assim, num primeiro momento, ser\u00e1 apresentada a perspectiva de Alain Renaut, fil\u00f3sofo franc\u00eas que, em sua abordagem da autoridade, dialoga direta e criticamente com Arendt. Em seguida, ser\u00e1 apresentada a origem do conceito sob a perspectiva de Hannah Arendt, bem como sua rela\u00e7\u00e3o com a educa\u00e7\u00e3o. De la d\u00e9construction des \u00c9tats-Nations \u00e0 l\u2019av\u00e8nement des syst\u00e8mes totalitaires le peuple juif aura \u00e9t\u00e9 malgr\u00e9-lui une victime privil\u00e9gi\u00e9e. C\u2019est ce qu\u2019Hannah Arendt \u00e9tudie dans Les Origines du totalitarisme. N\u00e9anmoins elle ne se contente pas d\u2019analyser le mal et, dans \u00ab La condition de l\u2019homme moderne \u00bb, elle nous offre, \u00e0 travers l\u2019analyse de la cit\u00e9 ath\u00e9nienne, les clefs d\u2019un monde post-totalitaire. ; We sketch in an experience of the jewish reference and the grecian tradition as well in Hannah Arendt\u2019s work. From the destruction of the States \u2013 Nations up to the advent of the totalitarian systems, the jewish people would have been the privileged victim \u2013 though they had never been required to \u2013. That is what Hannah Arendt does want to analyse in her work : The Origins of Totalitarism. Nevertheless, she does not get any satisfaction with her analysis of evil so, she gives us the keys to a post \u2013 totalitarian world through the tradition of the Athenian City in her next work : \u201c The Human condition\u201d. Sua principal contribui\u00e7\u00e3o ao conceito de pol\u00edtica \u00e9 o resgate de um conceito de a\u00e7\u00e3o como a instaura\u00e7\u00e3o do novo. Diversos autores j\u00e1 apontaram a inspira\u00e7\u00e3o greco-ateniense do empreendimento arendtiano. Este artigo pretende mostrar que, al\u00e9m da inspira\u00e7\u00e3o greco-ateniense que levou ao conceito da novidade da a\u00e7\u00e3o, a obra de Hannah Arendt tamb\u00e9m possui uma inspira\u00e7\u00e3o romano-republicana necess\u00e1ria para pensar a institucionaliza\u00e7\u00e3o de novas formas de a\u00e7\u00e3o. O texto pretende mostrar que as duas dimens\u00f5es est\u00e3o em uma posi\u00e7\u00e3o de tens\u00e3o na obra arendtiana, e que essa tens\u00e3o encontra uma solu\u00e7\u00e3o parcial nos escritos arendtianos sobre a rep\u00fablica nos Estados Unidos. A fil\u00f3sofa concebe a educa\u00e7\u00e3o como um espa\u00e7o de media\u00e7\u00e3o e cuidado entre as gera\u00e7\u00f5es, em que a mais antiga tem a responsabilidade de introduzir os novos no mundo. Nesse contexto, aborda-se a possibilidade de pensar a ideia da educa\u00e7\u00e3o que narre est\u00f3rias, criando um la\u00e7o de amizade entre gera\u00e7\u00f5es no mundo. This paper is intended as an investigation of the critical capability of audiences founded on the philosophy of Hannah Arendt. Based on my four years experience working as an ethnographer for an online fan community, three stages have observed regarding the critical capability of audiences. In the first stage, the operation of the imagination should be taken when audiences translated their experiences to a thought-object. In the second stage, the general communicability is the core criterion that audiences elaborate their thinking fruit to the public. In the third stage, audiences visit each other\u2019s position in imagination with homeless thought. The combination of all these stages help to promote the proposal that the critical capability of audiences is based on the process, not the outcome, of thinking and the meaning built by audiences themselves is the starting point of the thinking journey. \u601d\u8003; \u601d\u8fa8; \u8ff7\u7fa4; \u9102\uf91f; \u7db2\uf937\u6587\u5316; \u95b1\u807d\u4eba; thinking; reflexivity; fans; Hannah Arendt; internet culture; audienc  \u5f35\u7389\u4f69; Chang, Yupei"},{"id":"b26a6a5f03f0ddacef5c3c4edabc1924d533282135952d2c2b1522cfcccf44e0","content":"Hannah Arendt e la Modernit\u00e0: attualit\u00e0 di una riflessione La vastissima letteratura critica dedicata all\u2019opera di Hannah Arendt ha per anni condiviso un\u2019interpretazione piuttosto standardizzata che fa dell\u2019autrice una pensatrice nostalgica ed antimodernista, animata dall\u2019anacronistica intenzione di riproporre il modello della polis greca di fronte al declino della sfera pubblica tipico dell\u2019et\u00e0 moderna, in modo tale che pochissime delle sue categorie concettuali, se non nessuna, sarebbero rilevanti per capire la realt\u00e0 contemporanea. Su questo sfondo, si propone qui una rilettura del controverso rapporto tra Hannah Arendt e la modernit\u00e0. Anche alla luce degli apporti della storiografia pi\u00f9 recente \u2013 caratterizzata da un approccio pi\u00f9 critico e consapevole, che rinuncia all\u2019intento di consegnare una volta per tutte l\u2019autrice a una determinata scuola di pensiero \u2013, \u00e8 possibile, al contrario, trarre complessivamente dal pensiero arendtiano una duplice indicazione di segno decisamente \u201cmodernista\u201d, sia in relazione al giudizio della stessa nei confronti dell\u2019et\u00e0 moderna, sia in relazione all\u2019attualit\u00e0 di alcune sue proposte. Waldemar Gurian, nato a San Pietroburgo da famiglia giudaico-armena, visse per pi\u00f9 di vent\u2019anni in Germania, convertendosi al cattolicesimo. Si laure\u00f2 sotto la guida di Max Scheler e frequent\u00f2 Carl Schmitt. All\u2019avvento del nazismo, si trasfer\u00ec negli Stati Uniti, dove insegn\u00f2 Filosofia politica all\u2019universit\u00e0, proseguendo un\u2019intensa attivit\u00e0 saggistica e pubblicistica. Nel suo scritto, Hannah Arendt sottolinea, in particolare, l\u2019importanza che ebbe per lui l\u2019amicizia, per persone d\u2019ogni origine e ceto sociale; e la capacit\u00e0 di essere, sempre e realmente, se stesso: di mantenere una sorta di \u201cinnocenza\u201d originaria, che lo rendeva goffo e maldestro nel mondo degli oggetti, ma di intensa e piena umanit\u00e0 nei confronti dei conflitti dell\u2019animo umano, di grande vicinanza per le storie vissute di ogni altro, sapendo cogliere l\u2019essenza della persona \u201cdentro\u201d l\u2019opera: un\u2019essenza pi\u00f9 grande di ogni azione compiuta. O artigo tem tr\u00eas partes constitutivas: na primeira parte, apresentamos a teoria hayekiana da ordem espont\u00e2nea como uma ordem racional e leis t\u00e3o inexor\u00e1veis quanto as que ele critica em Marx. Em uma palavra, a ideia do autodesenvolvimento do mercado visto como a \u00fanica forma poss\u00edvel de organiza\u00e7\u00e3o para as sociedades contempor\u00e2neas. Na segunda parte, mostramos que conceitos caros ao liberalismo est\u00e3o presentes em autores cr\u00edticos, como Hannah Arendt, em que o indiv\u00edduo atrav\u00e9s da a\u00e7\u00e3o pol\u00edtica constr\u00f3i um mundo justo, conciliando liberdade individual com interesses coletivos. Finalmente, na terceira parte do artigo, contrapomos os dois autores, mostrando que o ant\u00eddoto ao totalitarismo e o espa\u00e7o da liberdade n\u00e3o est\u00e3o no liberalismo ou na l\u00f3gica do mercado, como advoga Hayek, mas na democracia, como pleiteia Arendt, conceito central do seu edif\u00edcio te\u00f3rico e espa\u00e7o privilegiado da a\u00e7\u00e3o pol\u00edtica, da liberdade e da justi\u00e7a. The question I address in this essay is whether it is possible \u2013 according to Arendt \u2013 to create active citizenship by means of democratic education. In order to answer this question I consider three models of democratic education, two of which should be rejected if one agrees with Arendt\u2019s assumptions. Doravante, a fil\u00f3sofa Hannah Arendt vem lan\u00e7ar luzes sobre esse entendimento, compreendendo a \u201cPolis\u201d, antes, numa esfera existencial, filos\u00f3fica, de um espa\u00e7o interpessoal resultante da a\u00e7\u00e3o coletiva de cidad\u00e3os reunidos para tratar de interesses comuns e n\u00e3o de um aglomerado urban\u00edstico, ou mesmo de um Estado na concep\u00e7\u00e3o moderna do termo. Tal afirma\u00e7\u00e3o \u00e9 de extrema import\u00e2ncia, pois nos faz repensar a categoria de identidade pol\u00edtica hel\u00eanica tomando como refer\u00eancia um conjunto de cren\u00e7as, h\u00e1bitos e vis\u00f5es de mundo comum que se expressam num espa\u00e7o n\u00e3o concreto e necessariamente institucionalizado. A proposta desta comunica\u00e7\u00e3o, portanto, \u00e9 de apresentar a no\u00e7\u00e3o de \u201cespa\u00e7o p\u00fablico\u201d como express\u00e3o sem\u00e2ntica genu\u00edna do conceito de Polis dentro da obra de Hannah Arendt. Aucune des \u00e9tudes r\u00e9centes toutefois ne d\u00e9passe l'ouvrage de base de Hannah Arendt qui demeure toujours l'un des plus fouill\u00e9s, des plus complets et des plus critiques. En effet pour Hannah Arendt le totalitarisme suppose \u00e0 la fois plus que l'inhumanit\u00e9 et plus que l'immoralit\u00e9. Selon celle-ci, il repr\u00e9sente l'\u00e9chec dramatique du politique et il implique une attaque d\u00e9lib\u00e9r\u00e9e contre le concept de l'humain si cher \u00e0 la tradition humaniste occidentale. Nous \u00e9tudions donc le lien qu'il y a dans le trait\u00e9 de Hannah Arendt entre le politique et l'humain. F\u00f8rste del er en litter\u00e6r biografi, der introducerer til hele forfatterskabet og placerer de enkelte v\u00e6rker i forhold til de debatter og begivenheder, Arendt var involveret i. I anden del fokuseres p\u00e5 Arendts inspiration fra Heidegger. Om drejningspunktet er paralleliteten mellem Heideggers Sein und Zeit fra 1927, og Arendts The Human Condition fra 1958, hvor Heideggers grundbegreber \u2019Geworfenheit\u2019 og \u2019Sein zum Tode\u2019 bliver til \u2019natality\u2019 og \u2019mortality\u2019 hos Arendt. Hendes fokusering p\u00e5 f\u00f8dslens mirakel, frem for det at v\u00e6re kastet ind i verden, danner rammen om en betydelig mere livsbekr\u00e6ftende t\u00e6nkning, hvor indsigten i totalitarismens negation af alt menneskeligt er baggrunden for en forst\u00e5else af, hvad det menneskelige er. I denne figur finder artiklen noget af forklaringen p\u00e5, at Arendt p\u00e5 \u00e9n gang kunne v\u00e6re s\u00e5 p\u00e5virket af Heidegger og samtidigt s\u00e5 forskellig fra ham. Nataliteten peger p\u00e5 f\u00f8dselen som et kontingent faktum i det menneskelige vilk\u00e5r, som artiklen med Arendt knytter til Privacy, der ikke bare betegner det private som mods\u00e6tning til det offentlige og det politiske i klassisk forstand, men er et specifikt moderne f\u00e6nomen, der betegner mods\u00e6tningen til den sociale sf\u00e6re. Som sf\u00e6re for f\u00f8dsel og d\u00f8d er privacy et helligsted for de mest intime menneskelige livsytringer, den er uigennemtr\u00e6ngelig for menneskelig viden, og dermed ogs\u00e5 en base for den modstandskraft mod den totalitarisme, der i det 20. \u00e5rhundrede fors\u00f8gte at \u00f8del\u00e6gge den. Med reference til historiske vendepunkter som 1944-45 og 1989 viser artiklen hvordan Arendts t\u00e6nkning indfanger den m\u00e5de, hvorp\u00e5 privat vilje og samvittighed kan blive til offentlig handlen og magt, der g\u00f8r en ny begyndelse mulig. Denne flertydighed forklares med den egenskab ved t\u00e6nkningen, at den spr\u00e6nger ethvert singul\u00e6rt betydningsindhold. T\u00e6nkningen har en dual modus, der afspejler venskabets struktur, som det kendes fra de sokratiske dialoger. T\u00e6nkningen afspejler dermed ogs\u00e5 et opg\u00f8r med det singul\u00e6res tankel\u00f8shed, som det for eksempel kom til udtryk i den franske revolutions forestilling om det politiske legemes enhed. Selvom venskabet ligesom k\u00e6rligheden er trukket tilbage fra offentligheden, argumenteres der for, at der er en overgang fra venskabets dualitet til det politiskes pluralitet via d\u00f8mmekraften som menneskets mest politiske evne. Arendts skrifter peger s\u00e5ledes i retning af en politisk hermeneutik, for s\u00e5 vidt hermeneutikken ligesom venskabet altid holder den mulighed \u00e5ben, at den anden kunne have ret. However, her research problem had not yet been well delineated, and both texts dealing with the matter highlight the concept of formation (Bildung) instead of directly addressing education and its institutions. Our goal in this article is to investigate how the subject was addressed by Hannah Arendt prior to her immigration to the United States and what elements remain in her later works. In order to do so, we shall deal with two texts: (i) her review of German pedagogue Hans Weil's work, Die Entstehung des deutschen Bildungsprinzip, published in 1930; and (ii) The Enlightenment and the Jewish Question, from 1932. La tensi\u00f3n entre acci\u00f3n y derecho en Hannah Arendt Se recoge aqu\u00ed por primera vez en lengua espa\u00f1ola el \u00faltimo texto de Hannah Arendt que se ha dado a conocer, publicado en el a\u00f1o 2007 en lengua inglesa. Se trata de una conferencia que la pensadora imparti\u00f3 en la Universidad de Princeton en 1953. Sin que se hayan cumplido a\u00fan 40 a\u00f1os desde su muerte, el pensamiento de Arendt despierta un inter\u00e9s creciente entre te\u00f3ricos de la pol\u00edtica y fil\u00f3sofos, y tambi\u00e9n entre soci\u00f3logos y pensadores de diversas disciplinas de todos los lugares del mundo. Se publican numerosas obras cada a\u00f1o sobre la autora, se organizan seminarios y se han creado varios think tanks dedicados en exclusiva al estudio de su pensamiento, el m\u00e1s activo de ellos es el Hannah Arendt Center del Bard College en Nueva York. Todo ello se ha agudizado en el a\u00f1o 2013 en que se ha cumplido el 50 aniversario de la publicaci\u00f3n de su reportaje sobre el juicio de Adolf Eichmann en Jerusal\u00e9n. Con este motivo se han organizado congresos y han aparecido nuevas publicaciones; e incluso una pel\u00edcula sobre la pol\u00e9mica que despert\u00f3 su reportaje. Este trabalho tem por objetivo analisar o conceito de autoridade na obra de Hannah Arendt, propondo uma abordagem que busca romper com as perspectivas que veem a autoridade como um epifen\u00f4meno do poder. Desse modo, busca-se lan\u00e7ar um olhar sobre a autoridade como um elemento consubstancial \u00e0 educa\u00e7\u00e3o e n\u00e3o como um mero instrumento de poder, submiss\u00e3o e sujei\u00e7\u00e3o de indiv\u00edduos. Assim, num primeiro momento, ser\u00e1 apresentada a perspectiva de Alain Renaut, fil\u00f3sofo franc\u00eas que, em sua abordagem da autoridade, dialoga direta e criticamente com Arendt. Em seguida, ser\u00e1 apresentada a origem do conceito sob a perspectiva de Hannah Arendt, bem como sua rela\u00e7\u00e3o com a educa\u00e7\u00e3o. Denne flertydighed forklares med den egenskab ved t\u00e6nkningen, at den spr\u00e6nger ethvert singul\u00e6rt betydningsindhold. T\u00e6nkningen har en dual modus, der afspejler venskabets struktur, som det kendes fra de sokratiske dialoger. T\u00e6nkningen afspejler dermed ogs\u00e5 et opg\u00f8r med det singul\u00e6res tankel\u00f8shed, som det for eksempel kom til udtryk i den franske revolutions forestilling om det politiske legemes enhed. Selvom venskabet ligesom k\u00e6rligheden er trukket tilbage fra offentligheden, argumenteres der for, at der er en overgang fra venskabets dualitet til det politiskes pluralitet via d\u00f8mmekraften som menneskets mest politiske evne. Arendts skrifter peger s\u00e5ledes i retning af en politisk hermeneutik, for s\u00e5 vidt hermeneutikken ligesom venskabet altid holder den mulighed \u00e5ben, at den anden kunne have ret. In the Cold War period Hannah Arendt, a female political theorist, distinguished between the definitions of violence and power to suggest peace building to politics. Yet, her suggestion inclines to oppose Marxist theory and the leftist. It obviously supports the power of the United States where she had settled down. Meanwhile there were feminist movements challenging patriarchy and her political theory seem influenced from a revolutionary feminist component. This article tends to study on the episteme of her peace building and violence especially the dimension during the Cold War and Feminism. Nas homenagens prestadas \u00e0 Hannah Arendt por ocasi\u00e3o de sua morte, o fil\u00f3sofo Hans Jonas - amigo de Arendt desde o tempo que foram colegas na universidade em Marburg e alunos de Heidegger - destacou sua voca\u00e7\u00e3o para a amizade. Segundo ele, o que a movia era o Eros da amizade (Eros der Freundschaft). No c\u00edrculo dos amigos mais pr\u00f3ximos, inclu\u00eda-se Walter Benjamin, com quem convivera no ex\u00edlio em Paris entre os anos 1936 e 1940. E a amizade como pensada e cultivada na pr\u00e1tica pelos dois pensadores situava-se no centro de suas vidas, como la\u00e7o afetivo e vis\u00e3o de mundo. Este paper aborda a rela\u00e7\u00e3o entre Arendt e Benjamin em dois \u00e2mbitos: a amizade, constru\u00edda na situa\u00e7\u00e3o de fil\u00f3sofos judeus-alem\u00e3es refugiados em Paris, e as afinidades eletivas na concep\u00e7\u00e3o da hist\u00f3ria e da modernidade. Hannah Arendt; Walter Benjamin; Ex\u00edlio; Eros da amizade; Afinidades eletivas Sociedade e Estado v.35 n.3 2020 Coelho,Maria Francisca Pinheiro"},{"id":"992daacb320f80a6810c52b354fa061bd1bef474c9620161db13675ba75060e8","content":"Power, Violence and Revolution in Walter Benjamin and Hannah Arendt ; Poder, violencia y revoluci\u00f3n en Walter Benjamin y Hannah Arendt In this paper we\u2019ll analyze the concepts of power, violence and revolution in the reflections of Walter Benjamin and Hannah Arendt. These concepts are key for understanding the difficulties present in both authors when thinking on the problem of the emergence of new political agents in the publicpolitic space. In this context, what interests us is to explore a possible complementarity of the analyses of both Arendt and Benjamin with respect to this specific problematic, a complementarity that could, from our point of view, help to overcome those difficulties. In this sense, we will argue that, beyond the differences in the approaches of both authors with relation to the analysis of violence, power and revolution, they concur in the idea that, in a revolution, the creation of new political actors (Arendt) and the irruption of past political experiences (Benjamin) redefines the role of violence and power in the public-political space. ; En este trabajo nos abocaremos al an\u00e1lisis de los conceptos de poder, violencia y revoluci\u00f3n en las reflexiones de Walter Benjamin y Hannah Arendt. Dichos conceptos resultan claves para comprender las dificultades presentes en ambos autores a la hora de pensar la problem\u00e1tica de la aparici\u00f3n de nuevos agentes pol\u00edticos en el espacio p\u00fablico-pol\u00edtico. A partir de este problema, nos interesa explorar la posible complementariedad de los an\u00e1lisis de Hannah Arendt y de Walter Benjamin en relaci\u00f3n a estas problem\u00e1ticas. As\u00ed, argumentaremos que, m\u00e1s all\u00e1 de las diferencias de los planteos de Benjamin y de Arendt en el an\u00e1lisis que hacen sobre la violencia, el poder y la revoluci\u00f3n, ambos coinciden en que en esta \u00faltima la aparici\u00f3n de nuevos actores pol\u00edticos (Arendt), como as\u00ed tambi\u00e9n la irrupci\u00f3n de experiencias pol\u00edticas del pasado que han quedado ocultas (Benjamin), redefinen el rol de la violencia y el poder en el espacio pol\u00edtico. If politics is defined as common action by men who are equal, butat the same time diverse, and aimed at opening up a space for liberty, revolution is the most explicitmanifestation of the desire to achieve this aim. According to the author, this is what revolutionsshould be about, although it does not correspond to historical realty but rather to a Utopian projectionof a desired revolution, still to come, which moreover entails an transcendental ethical tone. ; Del an\u00e1lisis que proponemos se infiere que el concepto de revoluci\u00f3n de Hannah Arendt es una elaboraci\u00f3n a posteriori condicionada por su idea de la pol\u00edtica. Definida \u00e9sta como la acci\u00f3n en com\u00fan de los hombres iguales y, al tiempo, diversos, para abrir un \u00e1mbito de libertad, la revoluci\u00f3n no puede ser sino la m\u00e1s clara manifestaci\u00f3n pr\u00e1ctica de esa acci\u00f3n en la b\u00fasqueda de tal objetivo. Esto es lo que, a decir de la autora, debe ser una revoluci\u00f3n pero esa imagen no se corresponde con la concreci\u00f3n hist\u00f3rica del hecho revolucionario sino con el bosquejo de una ut\u00f3pica revoluci\u00f3n deseada, todav\u00eda pendiente, que incorpora adem\u00e1s un transcendente tono \u00e9tico.From the analysis we offer it can be inferred that Hannah Arendt\u2019s concept of revolution is a posteriori to her idea about politics. If politics is defined as common action by men who are equal, but at the same time diverse, and aimed at opening up a space for liberty, revolution is the most explicit manifestation of the desire to achieve this aim. According to the author, this is what revolutions should be about, although it does not correspond to historical realty but rather to a Utopian projection of a desired revolution, still to come, which moreover entails an transcendental ethical tone. Baseia-se nos meus pr\u00f3prios apontamentos como seu aluno em Cornell e nos roteiros preparados por Hannah Arendt para ministrar o curso, que est\u00e3o guardados nos seus pap\u00e9is na Biblioteca do Congresso dos Estados Unidos. Indica, com base na documenta\u00e7\u00e3o contida na Biblioteca do Congresso, as converg\u00eancias desse curso com o ministrado anteriormente, em 1955, na Universidade da Calif\u00f3rnia e, subseq\u00fcentemente, em 1968, na New School for Social Research. Explora como esses cursos contribuem para a compreens\u00e3o da import\u00e2ncia por ela atribu\u00edda, na sua obra, \u00e0 experi\u00eancia, \u00e0 narra\u00e7\u00e3o, \u00e0 a\u00e7\u00e3o, \u00e0 imagina\u00e7\u00e3o e ao ju\u00edzo reflexivo, que s\u00e3o componentes da maior relev\u00e2ncia na configura\u00e7\u00e3o da originalidade do percurso intelectual de Hannah Arendt e que dela fazem uma das grandes pensadoras do s\u00e9culo XX. The article examines the intellectual relevance of Hannah Arendt\u2019s graduate course, \"Political Experiences of the Twentieth Century\", given in the Fall of 1965 at Cornell University. The article draws on my notes taken as her student in this course and on her own notes prepared for the course that are in her papers in the Library of Congress. The article relates, on the basis of her papers in the Library of Congress, this course to a previous one offered in 1955 at the University of California and to a subsequent one in 1968 given at the New School for Social Research. The article explores how these courses are relevant for the understanding of the importance in Hannah Arendt\u2019s work of experience, narrative, action, imagination, reflective judgement, that are critical components of her originality as a major thinker of the XXth century. D\u00fcnya Sava\u015f\u0131 bitiminde Nazilerin ge\u00e7mi\u015f y\u0131llardaki y\u00f6netimleri esnas\u0131nda i\u015fledikleri su\u00e7larla ilgili olarak iki \u00fcnl\u00fc Alman d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcr\u00fcn, Karl Jaspers ve \u00f6\u011frencisi Hannah Arendt\u2019in su\u00e7luluk sorununa yakla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131n\u0131 irdelemektedir. Jaspers 1946 y\u0131l\u0131nda Heidelberg \u00dcniversitesi\u2019nin yeniden a\u00e7\u0131lmas\u0131yla birlikte \u201cSu\u00e7luluk Sorunu\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 tarihe ge\u00e7en dersinde \u201chukuki\u201d, \u201csiyasal\u201d, \u201cahlaki\u201d ve \u201cmetafizik\u201d olmak \u00fczere d\u00f6rt tip su\u00e7 tan\u0131mlar. Jaspers\u2019e g\u00f6re Alman halk\u0131n\u0131n tamam\u0131na bir \u201ckolektif su\u00e7\u201d y\u00fcklemek hem do\u011fru de\u011fildir hem de onur k\u0131r\u0131c\u0131d\u0131r. Ancak her Alman vatanda\u015f\u0131n\u0131n kendi vicdan\u0131nda ge\u00e7mi\u015fiyle y\u00fczle\u015fmesini, hesapla\u015fmas\u0131n\u0131 ve ar\u0131nmas\u0131n\u0131 talep eder. Hannah Arendt ise kolektif su\u00e7u reddetmekle birlikte \u201ckolektif sorumluluk\u201d kavram\u0131ndan yola \u00e7\u0131karak, ayn\u0131 toplum i\u00e7inde bir arada ya\u015fayan insanlar\u0131n bu sorumluluktan ka\u00e7\u0131namayacaklar\u0131n\u0131 yazmaktad\u0131r. Her iki d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcr de ortak sorumluluk bilinci nedeniyle toplumlar\u0131n, atalar\u0131n\u0131n i\u015fledi\u011fi su\u00e7lar\u0131 \u00fcstlenmek zorunda olduklar\u0131n\u0131 iddia etmektedirler. ; This article explores the different approaches of two prominent German thinkers, namely Karl Jaspers and his student Hannah Arendt, to the question of guilt on the crimes that have been committed by the Nazis during the Second World War. During his formative seminar entitled \u201cThe Question of German Guilt\u201d, after the re-inauguration of Heidelberg University in 1946, Karl Jaspers defined four types of guilt: \u201cjudicial\u201d, \u201cpolitical\u201d, \u201cmoral\u201d and \u201cmetaphysical\u201d. For Jaspers, to impose a \u201ccollective guilt\u201d to the whole of German nation would not only be wrong but also insulting. But he demands that every German citizen should confront his\/her past, sort it out and redeem. On the other hand, Hannah Arendt rejects the idea of collective guilt but underlines the concept of collective responsibility, stating that persons who live in the same nation cannot escape this type of responsibility. Both of these thinkers claim that because of collective responsibility nations must take the blame of the crimes committed by their ancestors. ; No sponsor Moral guilt; Sense of guilt; Question of guilt; Collective guilt; Collective responsibility; Ahlaki su\u00e7; Su\u00e7luluk bilinci; Su\u00e7luluk sorunu; Kolektif su\u00e7; Kolektif sorumluluk  \u00d6rnek, Yusuf Mehmet"},{"id":"48bc1ba8f7b429e50c4cc992b9fdf961e2a56c7876ee00c74ea62574853c5577","content":"Hannah Arendt e a filosofia pol\u00edtica na era at\u00f4mica ; Hannah Arendt and political philosophy in the atomic age A fil\u00f3sofa pol\u00edtica Hannah Arendt (1906-1975) \u00e9 mundialmente conhecida como uma das principais te\u00f3ricas do fen\u00f4meno do totalitarismo. N\u00e3o obstante, h\u00e1 tamb\u00e9m como quest\u00e3o estrutural a atravessar seu pensamento a n\u00e3o menos importante quest\u00e3o n\u00e3o apenas das armas ditas nucleares (bomba at\u00f4mica, bomba de hidrog\u00eanio), mas mais geralmente da ci\u00eancia nuclear. Neste sentido, o presente artigo objetiva explorar, em um primeiro momento, a recep\u00e7\u00e3o filos\u00f3fica dos acontecimentos ligados ao lan\u00e7amento das primeiras bombas at\u00f4micas; num segundo, a interpreta\u00e7\u00e3o arendtiana das quest\u00f5es acima aludidas para, por fim, tomando como ponto de partida a reflex\u00e3o arendtiana sobre a rela\u00e7\u00e3o entre modernidade e dom\u00ednio da ci\u00eancia\/tecnologia at\u00f4mica, pensar a nossa situa\u00e7\u00e3o contempor\u00e2nea em face de tais quest\u00f5es. ; The political philosopher Hannah Arendt (1906-1975) is worldly known as one the main theoreticists on the phenomenon of totalitarianism. However, there is another object which is perhaps as important in terms of the construction of her thought, viz. not only the atom bomb more specifically, but more generally the issue of nuclear science. In this sense, the present paper seeks to investigate I) the philosophical reception to the launching of the first atom bombs; II) the arendtian interpretation of the matters advanced above and this in order to III) throw some light on our present situation in what concerns precisely the issues related to te dominion of nuclear technology. \u00c9tica e Filosofia Pol\u00edtica; Hannah Arendt. Its focus is to understand the reason why the author chose the biographical genre, instead of working only with the argumentative text, as it is usual in the philosophical practice. We will work with two of her leading texts on the subject, Rahel Varnhagen: the life of a Jewess, and Men in dark times.The hypothesis that guides the work is that biographical writing in Arendt means the elaboration of a theory of history that is incompatible with the modern conception of History, while arguing about a new connection between action and narration. ; A proposta do artigo \u00e9 refletir sobre os ensaios biogr\u00e1ficos produzidos por Hannah Arendt. Trata-sede buscar compreender porque a autora escreve biografias, e n\u00e3o apenas textos argumentativos, como \u00e9 usual na pr\u00e1tica filos\u00f3fica. Teremos em vista, sobretudo, dois de seus esfor\u00e7os mais contundentes, seu texto sobre Rahel Varnhagen: a vida de uma judia alem\u00e3 na \u00e9poca do Romantismoe os ensaios reunidos em Homens em tempos sombrios. A suposi\u00e7\u00e3o \u00e9 a de que a narrativa devidas em Arendt configura-se menos como um m\u00e9todo de pesquisa e mais como a elabora\u00e7\u00e3o de uma teoria da hist\u00f3ria, a qual parte de uma refuta\u00e7\u00e3o do conceito moderno de Hist\u00f3ria para defender um novo la\u00e7o entre a\u00e7\u00e3o e narra\u00e7\u00e3o. The Greek polis, and particularly Athens democracy, will be the most important political paradigm for Hannah Arendt. In our paper we want to ask which Greek sources are used by the author to compose her own conception of the classical Greek city. In this search we arrived to Homer, the heroic life and the Trojan battlefield. To Hannah Arendt, the classical Athens intended only to restore and to reproduce the authentically political relationship that existed in the archaic Trojan battlefield. ; A filosofia pol\u00edtica de Hannah Arendt tem como pressuposto b\u00e1sico a tese de que a hist\u00f3ria da filosofia pol\u00edtica ou \"tradi\u00e7\u00e3o de filosofia pol\u00edtica\", como a denomina, se erigiu durante toda a sua dura\u00e7\u00e3o contra seu objeto, a vida pol\u00edtica, n\u00e3o reconhecendo a autenticidade da vida pol\u00edtica grega cl\u00e1ssica, que se situava precisamente na origem dessa \"tradi\u00e7\u00e3o\". A democracia ateniense ser\u00e1 ent\u00e3o seu grande paradigma pol\u00edtico. Nesse texto, preocupados com as fontes gregas usadas por Hannah Arendt para compor sua vis\u00e3o da cidade grega cl\u00e1ssica, chegamos a Homero, a vida her\u00f3ica e as rela\u00e7\u00f5es no campo de batalha troiano. Para nossa autora a Atenas cl\u00e1ssica nada mais pretendeu que resgatar as rela\u00e7\u00f5es, autenticamente pol\u00edticas, do campo de batalha troiano. tradition of political philosophy; political paradigm; classical polis; Homeric heroe; tradi\u00e7\u00e3o de filosofia pol\u00edtica; paradigma pol\u00edtico; p\u00f3lis cl\u00e1ssica; her\u00f3i hom\u00e9rico Cadernos de \u00c9tica e Filosofia Pol\u00edtica; v. 2 n. 11 (2007); 97-118 ; 2317-806X ; 1517-0128 Francisco, Maria F\u00e1tima Sim\u00f5es"}]
